DOC.brief_summary: The aim study evaluate knowledge behavior physician regard Hepatitis B Virus . The investigator design 30-item self-administered questionnaire assess physician ' knowledge behavior regard chronic Hepatitis B Virus infection . These result provide data support update guideline , continue training , even develop policy medical insurance .
DOC.brief_title: Knowledge Practice Chinese Medical Specialists Regarding Chronic Hepatitis B Virus Infection
DOC.detailed_description: Schedule study : Before March 1 , 2015 : study design , complete questionnaire design , preparatory work ; Before July 1 , 2015 : kick-off meeting plot study , modify questionnaire , obtain questionnaire ; Before September 30 , 2015 : finishing data entry , statistical analysis , draft report , issue final report
DOC.criteria: 1 . Mainly engage liver disease diagnosis treatment ; 2 . Diagnosis treatment least 10 patient chronic Hepatitis B Virus infection per week . 1. young doctor work less one year ; 2. physician work hospital Traditional Chinese Medicine 3. visit doctor .
